title: World Series: JT Realmuto Learned Success From his Wrestling Family
description: J.T. Realmuto grew up watching his family — including the two-time gold medalist John Smith — dominate one sport. It helped him visualize success in another.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:description: J.T. Realmuto gets a lot of attention for his batting, but he is a superb defensive catcher as well. He is a 2022 finalist for a Gold Glove.
